cause.description:
Take a look at this picture.....imagine that being you sister....your brother......a cousin......a friend......or you...........This girl is either dead or in indescribable pain.......If she is alive she will live the rest of her life traumatized and crippled......we need to try and stop this from happening.....
1. Stopping War
2. Promoting Peace
3. Helping Children
cause.name: We MUST Have Peace!
